title: headerAttribute
description: Headers to Geometry resources must be uniform across a cache and may only contain fixed-width, single element fields. The HeaderDefinition provides the name of each field for later access and the valueType of that header field.

property.description: The name of the property in the header.

type.description: The element type of the header property, from <code>{UInt8, UInt16, UInt32, UInt64, Int16, Int32, Int64 or Float32, Float64}.
